title.en: Research Seminar in Cryptography and Cyber Security

structural_unit_name.en: Chair of Security and Theoretical Computer Science

name.en: Chair of Security and Theoretical Computer Science

description.en: The topic of seminar varies and each year. It is focused on different  areas of cryptology.
description.et: Seminar käsitleb iga kord erinevat krüptoloogia valdkonda.

objectives.en: The main aim of the seminar is to assist students in their master studies cryptography or  computer security and give the student an overview of  few selected subfields of cryptography.
objectives.et: Seminari peaeesmärgiks on toetada üliõpilase krüptograafia või andmeturbe alaseid magistriõpinguid  ning tutvustada üliõpilasele erinevaid krüptograafia alamvaldkondi.

learning_outcomes.en: Students  get aquinted  with cryptographic literature and  enhance their  abilities in scientific writing and giving research talks.
learning_outcomes.et: Üliõpilane saab esmase kogemuse krüptograafiliste allikmater-jalidega töötamisel ning arendab oma oskusi saadud tulemuste korrektsel vormistamisel ja esitlemisel.
